attributes.title: Astonishingly disgusting🧚🏽✨❤️
attributes.review: How could this app be such a thing. It was terrible. I saw the name and already knew it was bad. Just as bad as he is as president✨. Don’t try again😍. Just no❤️.
As soon  as I opened this app my dogs vomited EVERYWHERE I thought it was just something gen z was doing as a prank but this is such a bad ap. 10/10 wouldn’t recommend!!!

attributes.title: AWFUL
attributes.review: this is the worst app i’ve ever used, i’ve had so many problems with it. it’s very glitchy and it lags! please remove this app

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP!!
attributes.review: I am a loyal Trump supporter. He has done amazing things for the economy, lbgp community, and black people. However, this app gave me a seizure!! This app spammed my phone so much!! It needs to immediately be deleted!!

attributes.title: Very angry
attributes.review: As soon as i open the app it made me scan my face. The app noticed that i was black so a whole bunch of n words started popping up.😔

attributes.title: Don’t recommend it.
attributes.review: I would of gave it zero stars but that wasn’t an option so i was forced to give it 1 star.

attributes.title: i love oranges but this AINT IT
attributes.review: god this app is so awful it deserves ZERO stars. I was just trying to go to the store and my phone started blowing up with notifications. Suddenly a car crashes into me AND BUSTED MY LIVE LAUGH LUNGS 🤬HOW DARE THIS APP HURT THE BEAUTIFUL AIRWAY THAT GOD HAS GIVEN ME 😡🤬😾I GIVE THIS A ONE STAR 😻😽🙀😹😾🙂

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: When I opened the app my entire neighborhood caught on fire 😩 don’t get this app 😢 very upsetting to all of my 69 kids 😡 and my fruit disappeared 😒 coincidence? I think not 🥵😳🤯

attributes.title: Dear Bunker Boy,
attributes.review:
We the people regret to inform you that your services are no longer desired. Time to find some other business to bankrupt because this ain’t it “chief.”

P.S: burn in hell 🧚‍♀️✨

attributes.title: disappointed
attributes.review:
downloaded this to learn more about President Trump but was disappointed to find fault coding, unrealizable sources, and a generally unpleasant experience
do better
